subject: Welcome to {{siteName}}, Your account is created
body:
{% if logo and logo.url %} {% else %} {{ siteName }} {% endif %}

Welcome to {{ siteName }}!

Hi{% if user.firstName %} {{ user.firstName }}{% endif %},

Thanks for creating an account. Your account is now active and ready to use.

You can now take advantage of member privileges to enhance your online shopping experience:

  • Faster Checkout: Save your addresses for a quicker process.
  • Order History: View past orders and track current shipments.
Visit Your Account

We look forward to seeing you soon!

{{ siteName }}

{% if footerAddress %}
